General.Name: Shandong Xinjufeng Technology Packaging Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shandong Xinjufeng Technology Packaging Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells aseptic packaging materials for liquid foods in China and internationally. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Block B, 21st Century Building, Beijing, China
